com.dropbox.core.v2

Class Users.FullAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dropbox.core.v2.Users.Account
      • com.dropbox.core.v2.Users.FullAccount
  • Enclosing class:
    Users

    public static class Users.FullAccount
extends Users.Account
    Detailed information about the current user's account.

    • Field Detail

      • email

        public final java.lang.String email
        The user's e-mail address.

      • country

        public final java.lang.String country
        The user's two-letter country code, if available. Country codes are based on ISO 3166-1.

      • locale

        public final java.lang.String locale
        The language that the user specified. Locale tags will be IETF language tags.

      • referralLink

        public final java.lang.String referralLink
        The user's referral link.

      • team

        public final Users.Team team
        If this account is a member of a team, information about that team.

      • isPaired

        public final boolean isPaired
        Whether the user has a personal and work account. If the current account is personal, then team will always be null, but isPaired will indicate if a work account is linked.

      • accountType

        public final Users.AccountType accountType
        What type of account this user has.

      • _reader

        public static final JsonReader<Users.FullAccount> _reader
